string-array.name: quad1
string-array.item: Displays text and follows the recommended Material Design guidelines.

string-array.name: quad2
string-array.item: Creates a composable that lays out and draws a given Painter class object.

string-array.name: quad3
string-array.item: A layout composable that places its children in a horizontal sequence.

string-array.name: quad4
string-array.item: A layout composable that places its children in a vertical sequence.
